LanguageData.PromptIngameQuit_Prompt: Do you really want to quit? Unsaved progress will be lost.
LanguageData.OptionsGame_MaxThreadsTooltip: Try to set this lower if you experience freezes during heavy traffic.
LanguageData.OptionsTwitch_EnterChannel: /bEnter the Twitch channel name in lowercase
LanguageData.LanguageMenu_Workshop: FIND NEW LANGUAGES ON THE WORKSHOP
LanguageData.PromptOverwriteSave_Prompt: The file /b%S /talready exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
LanguageData.WorkshopMenu_EnterName: Enter a new workshop item name
LanguageData.WorkshopMenu_UpdateExistingItem: or update an existing workshop item
LanguageData.GameMenuFinance_MustHaveAverageProfit: You must have at least $200 average profit over &the last 10 days to take out a loan.
LanguageData.GameMenuResearch_NotMakingProgress: You are not making any research progress at the moment.
LanguageData.GameMenuResearch_BuildAnOffice: Build an office and hire office workers to get things rolling.
LanguageData.GameMenuResearch_NotResearching: You are not researching any project at the moment.
LanguageData.GameMenuResearch_AverageDailyProgress: /bwith an average daily progress of %.1f man-hours.
LanguageData.GameMenuResearch_NoPrerequisites: /bYou don't have the prerequisite(s) to research this project
LanguageData.GameMenuResearch_ResearchingProject: /bYou are researching this project (%d man-hours left)
LanguageData.GameMenuNeeds_UnlockMonitoring: Research the 'Sales Monitoring' project to access &sales and demand data.
LanguageData.GameMenuNeeds_UnlockMarketing: Research the 'Marketing' projects to run marketing campaings.
LanguageData.GameHireMenu_UnlockRoad: /bUnlock and buy new road accesses to have&/bmore job applicants to choose from.
LanguageData.ActorCharacDesc_Speed: /tSpeed determines the walking speed of all characters &It also determines customers' checkout time
LanguageData.ActorCharacDesc_Patience: /tPatience determines at which rate customers' satisfaction decays while queueing
LanguageData.ActorCharacDesc_Sociability: /tSociability determines the ability for cashiers to cheer up customers at checkout, and the customers' response to it (eg: if either's sociability is close to zero, the cheering up will be null)
LanguageData.ActorSkillDesc_Cashier: /tThe cashier skill determines the speed at which cashiers process checkouts
LanguageData.ActorSkillDesc_StockClerk: /tThe stock clerk skill determines the speed at which stock clerks deliver stock
LanguageData.ActorSkillDesc_Janitor: /tThe janitor skill determines the speed at which janitors clean
LanguageData.ActorSkillDesc_Cook: /tThe cook skill determines the speed at which cooks cook
LanguageData.ActorSkillDesc_Builder: /tThe builder skill determines the speed at which builders build
LanguageData.ActorSkillDesc_OfficeWork: /tThe office work skill determines the speed at which office workers research
LanguageData.ActorSkillDesc_Security: /tThe security skill determines the speed at which guards chase thieves
LanguageData.ActorSkillDesc_Waiter: /tThe waitering skill determines the speed at which waiters serve customers
LanguageData.ActorStatusDesc_Satisfaction: /tFor customers: &Waiting in queues, products availability and squalor all affect your customers' satisfaction &For staff: &Salary determines staff satisfaction, and in turn satisfaction affects general staff efficiency
LanguageData.ActorStatusDesc_Hunger: /tHungry customers will go home if no restaurants are available at your center
LanguageData.ActorStatusDesc_Bladder: /tCustomers with a full bladder will go home if no restrooms are available at your center
LanguageData.ActorStatusDesc_Nausea: /tNauseated customers will leave your center &Additionally, satisfaction cannot be higher than inverse nausea
LanguageData.ActorPanel_WillComeToWorkInHours: will come to work in %d hours
LanguageData.ActorLog_Goinghomefilth: Going home, sickened by the filth
LanguageData.ActorLog_Urgentlyhungry: Urgently hungry, but restaurants are full
LanguageData.ActorLog_Needstogo: Needs to go, but restrooms are full
LanguageData.TraitDesc_Alcoholic: Can't resist liquor, beer and wine
LanguageData.TraitDesc_Sweettooth: Can't resist soda, candies, cookies and ice cream
LanguageData.TraitDesc_Gamer: Can't resist video games and consoles
LanguageData.TraitDesc_Techaddict: Can't resist Laptops, smartphones and tablets
LanguageData.TraitDesc_Fashionvictim: Can't resist dresses, shirts, jackets and coats
LanguageData.TraitDesc_Neatfreak: Can't resist detergent &Gets nauseous twice as fast &Bonus janitor skill
LanguageData.TraitDesc_Moviebuff: Chain watches movies at theaters &Can't resist DVDs and Blurays
LanguageData.TraitDesc_Musiclover: Can't resist MP3 players and Music CDs
LanguageData.TraitDesc_Glutton: Hunger can't go below 50 and rises twice as fast
LanguageData.TraitDesc_Incontinent: Bladder can't go below 50 and rises twice as fast &Can't resist diapers
LanguageData.TraitDesc_Weakstomach: Nausea can't go below 50 and rises twice as fast
LanguageData.TraitDesc_Litterer: Always litters even if trash cans are nearby
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_Coldchain: Unlocks the following products: &Fresh fruits &Fresh vegetables &Fresh meat &Fresh fish &Milk &Dairy
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_Frozenfoodsup: Unlocks the following products: &Ice cream &Frozen vegetables &Frozen pizzas
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_Chemicalsuppl: Unlocks the following products: &Detergents &Soap and shampoo &Cosmetics &Tooth care &Deodorants &Shaving cream and razors &Drugs &First aid
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_Clothingsuppl: Unlocks the following products: &T-Shirts &Pants &Dresses &Shirts &Jackets &Coats &Men shoes &Women shoes &Men underwear &Women lingerie
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_Electronicssu: Unlocks the following products: &Laptop computers &Game consoles &Smartphones &Tablets &MP3 players &Cameras &TV sets
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_Mediasupplier: Unlocks the following products: &Books &DVDs and Blurays &Music CDs &Video games
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_Appliancessup: Unlocks the following products: &Washing machine &Dish washer &Drying machine &Fridge
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_Toolssupplier: Unlocks the following products: &Hand Tools &Power tools
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_RoadnetworkI: Allows connection to an additional road entrance
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_RoadnetworkII: Allows connection to an additional road entrance
Allows connection to an additional road entrance
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_BustransportI: Allows bus transport and the construction of 10 bus stops
Allows the construction of 20 total bus stops
Allows the construction of 30 total bus stops
Allows the construction of 40 total bus stops
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_SalesMonitori: Allows the automatic monitoring of sales &which you can review on the Demand menu.
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_MarketingI: Allows marketing campaigns on traditional media
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_BigData: Allows uncovering of job applicants' traits via social networks
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_SecurityII: Unlocks self-balancing scooters for your security guards
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_Plants: Unlocks the following products: &Gardening Tools &Soil and Fertilizer &Plants &Flowers
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_ECigs: Unlocks the following products: &E-Cigarettes and Liquids
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_Logistics: Allows deliveries of 4 crates at a time instead of 2
LanguageData.ResearchProjectDescription_CleaningTech: Unlocks automatic floor scrubbers for your janitors
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_Storage: An area where products are delivered, mandatory for any retail activity.
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_Store: A retail business where physical items are sold to customers.
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_FastFoodRestaurant: A restaurant where customers order at the counter. No waiters. Low-skill cooks accepted.
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_TicketLobby: A lobby where customers buy tickets for events such as movie projections. Mandatory for movie theaters.
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_MovieTheater: A theater where movies are projected. Requires a ticket lobby to operate.
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_MaintenanceCenter: An area to hire and manage builders and janitors.
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_Restroom: A facility where customers can freshen up and empty their bladder.
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_BowlingAlley: An entertainment facility where players practice the ancient sport of ten-pin bowling.
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_Office: A place where office workers do administrative work, research and marketing.
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_FineDiningRestaurant: A restaurant where customers order at their table with waiters. High-skill cooks prefered.
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_Bar: A business that serves alcoholic beverages, such as beer, liquor and cocktails.
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_SecurityCenter: An area to hire and manage security guards.
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_CoffeeShop: A business that serves hot beverages, donuts and pastries.
LanguageData.ZoneDescription_FoodCourt: An area that provides seats and tables for patrons of nearby self-serve restaurants.
LanguageData.EventDesc_Christmas: Jingle Bells! Santa Claus is hard at work. &It's the biggest spending season of the year!
LanguageData.EventDesc_Valentine: Couples celebrate their love with gifts and a nice dinner. &Meanwhile singles try their luck at the bar.
LanguageData.EventDesc_Halloween: Every kid and dentist's favorite holiday. &Experts say candy sales will break new records.
LanguageData.EventDesc_BackToSchool: As summer vacation ends, families buy new clothes &and equipment in anticipation of the new school year.
LanguageData.EventDesc_StrikeDelivery: Unions for delivery workers have called for a 24h strike. &Expect little to no service.
LanguageData.EventDesc_StrikeGarbage: Unions for garbage workers have called for a 24h strike. &Expect little to no service.
LanguageData.EventDesc_StrikeBus: Unions for bus drivers have called for a 24h strike. &Expect little to no service.
LanguageData.EventDesc_Movie: A highly anticipated sequel is finally released. &Movie buffs are expected to flood theaters everywhere.
LanguageData.EventDesc_Game: Some had given up all hope but there it is: the latest &game in a legendary series is finally hitting stores!
LanguageData.EventDesc_Book: The latest volume in a best-selling series is finally released. &Fans are expected to rush and buy the book to avoid spoilers.
LanguageData.EventDesc_Mobile: A tech giant's new smartphone is generating unseen &levels of hype. First day sales might break records.
LanguageData.EventDesc_Music: A Grammy favorite is releasing their latest opus. &Fans will undoubtedly want to get their hands on the CD.
LanguageData.EventDesc_MothersDay: This celebration of motherhood has become heavily &commercialized. It would be a shame not to capitalize on it.
LanguageData.EventDesc_FathersDay: Families celebrate their patriarch by gifting them a nice &bottle and a new driller.
LanguageData.ManageZone_HoursTooltip: Research the /bNight Hours /tproject to open between 0:00 and 6:00
LanguageData.ManageStaff_ResearchBigData: Research the 'Big data' project to uncover this person's traits
LanguageData.BuildRoadwork_LockedReachedMax: /c2/bLOCKED - You reached the maximum number of bus stops (%d)
LanguageData.BuildObjects_DisplayAndSell: &Can be used to display and sell:
LanguageData.ObjectTooltip_NotAccessible: This object is not accessible by clerks and customers.
LanguageData.ObjectTooltip_NotBelongZone: This object does not belong to any active zone. Use the ASSIGN tool to extend an existing store's zone or create a new store.
LanguageData.ObjectTooltip_NoProduct: There is no product assigned for this object. &Right-Click to set a product.
LanguageData.ObjectTooltip_ProductExpired: The product on display has expired.
LanguageData.ObjectTooltip_NotAccessibleCustomers: This object is not accessible by customers.
LanguageData.Notification_Queues: /bMissed sales opportunities: Queues full (%02d:%02d) &Occurences: %d &/tCustomers are leaving /b%s /twithout buying anything because /bcheckout queues are full/t. &Add checkout counters and hire more cashiers to milk them for all they're worth &Left-Click to focus &Right-Click to dismiss
LanguageData.Notification_Squalor: /bMissed sales opportunities: Squalor (%02d:%02d) &Occurences: %d &/tCustomers are leaving the center because they are disgusted by the /bfilthyness/t. &Build maintenance centers and hire more janitors to keep them buying &Left-Click to focus &Right-Click to dismiss
LanguageData.Notification_Restrooms: /bMissed sales opportunities: Restrooms (%02d:%02d) &Occurences: %d &/tCustomers are leaving the center because there are no restrooms or restrooms are full. &Build restrooms and add toilet cubicles to keep them on site &Right-Click to dismiss
LanguageData.Notification_Restaurants: /bMissed sales opportunities: Restaurants (%02d:%02d) &Occurences: %d &/tCustomers are leaving the center because they are hungry and there are no restaurants or restaurants are full. &Build restaurants to keep them on site &Right-Click to dismiss
LanguageData.Notification_Parking: /bMissed sales opportunities: Parking (%02d:%02d) &Occurences: %d &/tCustomers can't access the center because there are no available spots on the parking lot. &Build more parking spots to accomodate more customers &Right-Click to dismiss
LanguageData.Notification_ResearchComplete: /bResearch project complete: %ls &/tLeft-Click to select a new project
LanguageData.Notification_Stocks: /bMissed sales opportunities: Out of stock (%02d:%02d) &Occurences: %d &/tCustomers are leaving /b%s /twithout buying anything because some products are out of stock/t. &Hire stock clerks and make sure your storage has enough capacity to prevent this &Left-Click to focus &Right-Click to dismiss
LanguageData.Notification_Rats: /bInfestation warning: Rats (%02d:%02d) &Occurences: %d &/tRats are spawning at your center due to the squalor and unhandled trash bags/t. &Build maintenance centers and hire builders to get rid of the rats &Also hire janitors to prevent rats from spawning in the first place &Left-Click to focus &Right-Click to dismiss
LanguageData.StatsHover_Unsatisfied: /b%d (%d%%) /tleft unsatisfied and will not come back tomorrow
LanguageData.HintMessage_PickStorage: /bPick a storage for your business by clicking on its area on the map
LanguageData.HintMessage_PickTicketLobby: /bPick a ticket lobby for your business by clicking on its area on the map
LanguageData.HintMessage_PickPatrol: /bPick a patrol for your guard by clicking on it on the map
LanguageData.BuildPrompt_DeleteZoneWarningPrompt: Warning! This action will delete at least one active zone and fire all staff (if any).
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_ClickToUnlockEntrance: Click to unlock this road entrance. Cost: $%S
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_DontHaveEnoughFunds: You don't have enough funds to unlock this entrance. Cost: $%S
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_ResearchToUnlockRoad: Research the /bRoad Network /tprojects to unlock this entrance.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_RoadIsInaccessible: This road is inaccessible. Connect it to the main entrance.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_AssignZoneDraw: Left-Click and drag to assign a zone. &If your selection overlaps an existing zone of the same type the zone will be extended. &Right-Click and drag to unassign a zone.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_AssignZoneFill: Left-Click to assign a zone to the current selection. &If your selection overlaps an existing zone of the same type the zone will be extended. &Right-Click to unassign a zone.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_AssignProducts: Left-Click and drag to assign a product to multiple shelves.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_AssignPatrols: Left-Click to draw or extend a patrol. &Right-Click to crop or delete a patrol.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_AssignTags: Left-Click and drag to mark products with anti-theft tags. &Right-Click and drag to remove anti-theft tags.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_CantBuildOutOfMap: You can't build in this area.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_ObjectCostDontHaveEnoughMon: Cost: /b$%S/t - You don't have enough money to buy this object.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_ObjectCantPlaceHere: You can't place this object here.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_ObjectMustPlaceInddors: You must place this object indoors.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_ObjectMustPlaceOnWall: You must place this object on a wall.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_CounterLowQueue: Cost: /b$%S/t. &/b/c2Max queue size: %d./t &/c0Press /bQ/t or the /bmousewheel button/t to rotate &Right-Click to cancel an order
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_CounterMaxQueue: Cost: /b$%S/t. &Max queue size: %d &Press /bQ/t or the /bmousewheel button/t to rotate &Right-Click to cancel an order
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_RoadworkCantOverlapBuilding: Roadwork can't overlap with buildings. If you really need to do roadwork here, delete part of the building first.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_RoadworkMustAlongside: This must be built along an existing road.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_RoadworkCannotCloseBusStops: You cannot build 2 Bus stops next to each other
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_RoadworkOrderCancel: Left-Click and drag to order building roadwork. &Right-Click and drag to cancel roadwork orders.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_RoadworkOrderCancelCost: Left-Click to order building roadwork. Cost: $%S &Right-Click and drag to cancel roadwork orders.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_RoadworkNotEnoughMoney: Cost: /b$%S/t - You don't have enough money to build this.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_FloorTile: Click and drag to select the area where you want the floor tiles changed. &Right-Click and drag to cancel orders.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_FloorTileCostNotEnoughMoney: Cost: /b$%S/t - You don't have enough money to build this.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_RemoveObjects: Left-Click and drag to order removing walls and objects in the area. &Right-Click and drag to cancel orders.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_RemoveFoundations: Left-Click and drag to order removing foundations, walls and objects in the area. &Right-Click and drag to cancel orders.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_RemoveRoadwork: Left-Click and drag to order removing roadwork in the area. &Right-Click and drag to cancel roadwork orders.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_FoundationsNotOverRoadwork: You cannot build over roadwork. If you really need to build here, delete the roadwork first.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_Foundations: Left-Click and drag to draw the building's boundaries. &Right-Click and drag to cancel orders.
LanguageData.BuildTooltip_FoundationsCostNotEnoughMon: Cost: /b$%S/t - You don't have enough money to build this.
LanguageData.Marketing_NotEnoughMoney: /c2/bYou don't have enough money for this campaign.
LanguageData.Tutorial_Intro1: Hello and welcome. &You have somehow inherited this massive land. &Regional planning however forbids residential or industrial zoning in the area. &Commercial is your only option.
LanguageData.Tutorial_Intro2: Let's have a look around. &Use WASD, or arrow keys to pan the camera. &Alternatively, hold the mousewheel button. &Use the mousewheel to zoom in and out. &You can also use T and G to zoom in and out.
LanguageData.Tutorial_Intro3: This short tutorial will walk you through opening your first business. &Let's get started!
LanguageData.Tutorial_Foundations: We need to build the foundations first. &Go into BUILD mode and select 'Foundations'. &Order your workers to build foundations by click-and-draging over the designated area.
LanguageData.Tutorial_WaitSpeed: Perfect. &Now we need to wait for the foundations to be finished before we can build further. &You can speed up time with the fast forward button.
LanguageData.Tutorial_Doors: We will need doors to access the building. &Go into BUILD mode and select 'Objects'. &Place a Staff Door and a Double Door on the designated spots.
LanguageData.Tutorial_Wall: We should separate our future storage and store with a wall. &In BUILD mode, select 'Walls'. &Click and drag to build a wall on the designated spot.
LanguageData.Tutorial_StaffDoor: Let's put a staff door on this wall. &In BUILD mode, select 'Objects'. &Place a Staff Door on the designated spot.
LanguageData.Tutorial_Storage: Now we will assign a function to the rooms. &Go into ASSIGN mode and select 'Storage' in the list. &Click and drag over the designated area to assign it as storage.
LanguageData.Tutorial_Store: Let's do the same but for the store area this time. &In ASSIGN mode, select 'Store' in the list. &Click and drag over the designated area to assign it as store.
LanguageData.Tutorial_Shelves: A store needs shelves to display products. &Go into BUILD mode and select 'Objects'. &Place Shelves and Food Shelves on the designated spots.
LanguageData.Tutorial_Checkout: Lastly, your store needs checkout counters. &In BUILD mode, select 'Objects'. &Place Checkout Counters on the designated spots.
LanguageData.Tutorial_SetProducts: You will need to set products to sell on your shelves. &Go into SELECT mode and RIGHT-CLICK on your shelves. &Select 'Set Product for Shelf'. &Select a sub-category and then select a product. &Try not to sell the same product twice for now. &Do this for all your shelves.
LanguageData.Tutorial_LoadingZone: We need to have a Loading Zone for deliveries. &Go into BUILD mode and select 'Roadwork'. &Select 'Loading Zone' in the list. &Build a Loading Zone on the designated spot.
LanguageData.Tutorial_AssignStorage: We need to link our storage with our store. &Go into MANAGE mode and select your STORE in the list. &Click on the ZONE tab. &Click on LINK STORAGE and click on your storage area.
LanguageData.Tutorial_Hire: Last thing before we can open: &In MANAGE mode, select your store in the list. &Click on the STAFF tab. &Hire a Cashier and a Stock Clerk.
LanguageData.Tutorial_TrashCan: Good job! &Your store is now complete and will open at 9:00. &Let's anticipate: customers will litter if we don't have a trash can nearby. &Go into BUILD mode and select 'Objects'. &Place a Trash Can on the designated spot.
LanguageData.Tutorial_GarbagePickup: We will also need a garbage pickup area to evacuate trash bags. &Go into BUILD mode and select 'Roadwork'. &Select 'Garbage Pickup' in the list. &Build a Garbage Pickup on the designated spot.
LanguageData.Tutorial_Janitor: Lastly, we need to hire a janitor to keep the floors clean and handle the garbage. They won't have much to do at first but they soon will! &In MANAGE mode, select your MAINTENANCE CENTER in the list. &Click on the STAFF tab. &Hire a Janitor.
LanguageData.Tutorial_OfficeFoundations: Good, that's taken care of. &At the moment we can only sell a small selection of products. We need to build an office to research new products, businesses and technologies. &Go into BUILD mode and select 'Foundations'. &Order your workers to build foundations over the designated area.
LanguageData.Tutorial_OfficeWait: Nice. &Now let's wait for the foundations to be finished before we can build further. &You can speed up time with the fast forward button.
LanguageData.Tutorial_OfficeObjects: Our office needs a door and a couple desks. &Go into BUILD mode and select 'Objects'. &Place a Staff Door and Office Desks on the designated spots.
LanguageData.Tutorial_OfficeAssign: Now let's assign the room as an office. &Go into ASSIGN mode and select 'Office' in the list. &Click and drag over the designated area to assign it as office.
LanguageData.Tutorial_OfficeHire: Office workers will work on research projects and marketing campaigns. &In MANAGE mode, select your OFFICE in the list. &Click on the STAFF tab. &Hire 2 Office workers.
LanguageData.Tutorial_SendOff1: All things seem to be in order! &Here are some tips for a smooth expansion: &Keep your Builders busy! &Your parking lot will fill up very quickly. &Build more customer parking to accomodate more visitors.
LanguageData.Tutorial_SendOff2: The default store opening hours are unambitious. &Manage your store to open earlier and close later. &You will also need to hire cashiers to work those hours.
LanguageData.Tutorial_SendOff3: Offering a greater diversity of products will attract a lot more customers. &Research projects to unlock highly sought products such as fresh food, clothes or alcohol. &Open specialty stores to satisfy demand for rare and expensive products.
LanguageData.Tutorial_SendOff4: Finally, having non-retail businesses will make your customers stay on site and spend a whole lot more. &Research and build restaurants, bowling alleys and movie theaters to be the number one destination for nearby shoppers.
LanguageData.Tutorial_SendOff5: Thank you for following this tutorial. &You're on your own now. &Tooltips and notifications are your friends. &Let's fill this wild land with concrete and capitalism.
LanguageData.NewGame_FindMoreScenario: FIND MORE SCENARIOS ON THE WORKSHOP
LanguageData.Scenario_EnterName: Enter a codename for your scenario
LanguageData.ScenarioDemo_ShortDesc: Expand the local convenience store and build a fast food restaurant for the hungry locals.
LanguageData.ScenarioDemo_Intro:
Welcome! &
The mayor of a nearby town has offered us to take ownership of the local convenience store on the condition that we build a fast food restaurant for the ever hungry locals. We're only getting deliveries of dry products at the moment, we'll need to build an office and hire some office workers to research the cold chain technology. This will allow deliveries of fresh products which are required to run a restaurant. It would also be a good idea to expand the parking lot to allow more customers on site. While your builders build and your office workers research, add some shelves to the convenience store and sell new products to get our profits rising!
LanguageData.ScenarioDemo_Step1:
Nice job! &
Now that we have unlocked the cold chain technology we can sell fresh produce for our customers and, more importantly, start researching restaurants! Don't forget to expand the parking lot, build checkout counters and hire cashiers as demand grows and more customers come to your store.
LanguageData.ScenarioDemo_Step2:
Great job! &
We're now able to build a fast food restaurant and meet that ever growing demand for greasy high calorie food. No need to build too big for now, one cook and a cashier should be sufficient at first. Meanwhile, keep expanding the parking lot, build checkout counters and hire cashiers at the general store as more customers come and spend their hard earned money.
LanguageData.ScenarioDemo_Step3:
Congratulations! &
Our little shopping area is certainly looking great and making a decent profit, and our fast food restaurant is delivering a steady flow of burgers. The mayor is delighted and the locals are well fed!
What will you build next?
LanguageData.AbandonedMall_ShortDesc: Revive an abandoned mall overtaken by rats and vegetation.
LanguageData.AbandonedMall_Intro:
Grab your hazmat suit! &
You have been tasked with reviving an abandoned mall overtaken by rats and vegetation. The only business still open is Lance and Walter's, a Bar whose clientele seem unfazed by the nasty rodents. First things first, we need to stop the rat infestation from spreading any further. Open at least 4 maintenance centers, preferably close to where the rats are spawning, and hire a small army of builders and janitors. Builders will get rid of the rats and janitors will clean the dirt and garbage that caused the infestation in the first place. Let's get to work!
LanguageData.AbandonedMall_Step1:
Alright! &
Our new workforce should be sufficient to handle our little rodent problem. If you feel it's not going fast enough, consider hiring some more builders. Meanwhile, we have to think about making money! Start opening shops in areas where the rats seem defeated and equipment and shelves are already there. You won't want to build too much until the rats are taken care of.
LanguageData.AbandonedMall_Step2:
Well, that's a relief! &
Now that the rats are gone we can start seriously rebuilding. Reopen all those businesses and watch the customers flood the mall! We might want to fire some of our builders to avoid paying unnecessary wages... Time to make some serious profit!
LanguageData.AbandonedMall_Step3:
Amazing job! &
The mall is back to life and thriving! And yet, surely, there is room for improvement...
LanguageData.DebugMenu_ToggleF1: PRESS /bF1/t TO TOGGLE THE DEBUG OVERLAY
LanguageData.ManageMods_Enabled: This mod is ENABLED. &Left-click to disable.
LanguageData.ManageMods_Disabled: This mod is DISABLED. &Left-click to enable.
LanguageData.ManageModsInGame_Enabled: This mod is ENABLED. &You cannot disable mods in-game.
LanguageData.ManageModsInGame_Disabled: This mod is DISABLED. &Left-click to enable. &WARNING: you will not be able to disable this mod once enabled!
LanguageData.ManageMods_MoveUp: Move mod up. &Will be loaded earlier.
LanguageData.ManageMods_MoveDown: Move mod down. &Will be loaded later.
LanguageData.ManageMods_MissingMods: This file has %d unresolved mod dependencies. Do you want to subscribe to missing mods?
LanguageData.ManageMods_MissingModsSubscribed: %d missing mod(s) were subscribed to. You might need to restart the game for them to load properly.
LanguageData.Workshop_ItemUploadMissing: Your mod must exist in both workshop\in\mods\ and workshop\out\mods\ when starting the game in order to upload it to the workshop.
LanguageData.Workshop_ItemUpload: Uploading item to the workshop. Please wait.
LanguageData.Workshop_ItemUploaded: Workshop item successfully uploaded. You should now edit the title, description and change note on the Steam Workshop.
LanguageData.UploadMods_NoMods: There are no mods to upload.
